column1: %1DHL Parcel Germany%2 is an ideal complement to the AUTOCOMPLETE and ADDRESSFACTORY services of Deutsche Post Direkt.
column2: %1DHL Parcel Germany%2 is an ideal complement to the AUTOCOMPLETE and ADDRESSFACTORY services of Deutsche Post Direkt.

column1: A sender's reference number can be configured per destination country. It is used by customs authorities to identify economics operators an/or other persons involved.
column2: A sender's reference number can be configured per destination country. It is used by customs authorities to identify economics operators an/or other persons involved.

column1: Adjust your parcel delivery flexibly to your schedule. Receive your packages while on the go at one of over 28,000 pickup locations in Germany - at a DHL parcel station or post office. Wherever it best suits your needs.
column2: Adjust your parcel delivery flexibly to your schedule. Receive your packages while on the go at one of over 28,000 pickup locations in Germany - at a DHL parcel station or post office. Wherever it best suits your needs.

column1: All orders that are placed after the configured time are assumed to be handed over to DHL Paket on the next business day. All orders that are placed before that time are expected to be handed over to DHL Paket on the same day. Value is interpreted as in the timezone configured for the current website.
column2: All orders that are placed after the configured time are assumed to be handed over to DHL Paket on the next business day. All orders that are placed before that time are expected to be handed over to DHL Paket on the same day. Value is interpreted as in the timezone configured for the current website.

column1: Allow customers to check out with DHL Paket shipping methods.
column2: Allow customers to check out with DHL Paket shipping methods.

column1: Allow customers to declare a deposit location during checkout.
column2: Allow customers to declare a deposit location during checkout.

column1: Allow customers to get shipments delivered to a parcel station.
column2: Allow customers to get shipments delivered to a parcel station.

column1: Allow customers to name a preferred neighbor during checkout.
column2: Allow customers to name a preferred neighbor during checkout.

column1: Allow customers to request parcel notification updates via e-mail by DHL during checkout.
column2: Allow customers to request parcel notification updates via e-mail by DHL during checkout.

column1: Allow customers to select a delivery day.
column2: Allow customers to select a delivery day.

column1: An error occurred while preparing package data.
column2: An error occurred while preparing package data.

column1: Choose a weather-protected and non-visible place on your property where we can deposit the parcel in your absence.
column2: Choose a weather-protected and non-visible place on your property where we can deposit the parcel in your absence.

column1: Choose one of the displayed days for your parcel delivery. Other days are not possible due to delivery processes.
column2: Choose one of the displayed days for your parcel delivery. Other days are not possible due to delivery processes.

column1: Create shipping labels & tracking information for your orders directly in the Magento admin panel.
column2: Create shipping labels & tracking information for your orders directly in the Magento admin panel.

column1: DHL Paket provides parcel shipping across Germany and to more than 220 countries.
column2: DHL Paket provides parcel shipping across Germany and to more than 220 countries.

column1: DHL Preferred Delivery. Delivered just the way you want.
column2: DHL Preferred Delivery. Delivered just the way you want.

column1: DHL contract customers receive the access data to the DHL Business Customer Portal via DHL Paket sales.
column2: DHL contract customers receive the access data to the DHL Business Customer Portal via DHL Paket sales.

column1: Declare a person in your immediate neighborhood whom we can hand out your parcel. This person should live in the same building, directly opposite or next door.
column2: Declare a person in your immediate neighborhood whom we can hand out your parcel. This person should live in the same building, directly opposite or next door.

column1: Delivery Day: Delivery on your preferred day
column2: Delivery Day: Delivery on your preferred day

column1: Drop-off Location: Delivery to your preferred drop-off location
column2: Drop-off Location: Delivery to your preferred drop-off location

column1: Enable DHL print only if codeable service
column2: Enable DHL print only if codeable service

column1: Enable DHL retail outlet routing service
column2: Enable DHL retail outlet routing service

column1: Enter your API user name, lower case only. Please talk to your account representative to add API access to your business account.
column2: Enter your API user name, lower case only. Please talk to your account representative to add API access to your business account.

column1: Enter your email address here if you, as the sender, would like to receive the collection information.
column2: Enter your email address here if you, as the sender, would like to receive the collection information.

column1: Failed to calculate next possible shipment date. Please revise your cut-off times setting.
column2: Failed to calculate next possible shipment date. Please revise your cut-off times setting.

column1: First name, last name of neighbor
column2: First name, last name of neighbor

column1: Furthermore, the DHL Paket module allows to request shipping labels for incoming orders directly within your Magento suite.
column2: Furthermore, the DHL Paket module allows to request shipping labels for incoming orders directly within your Magento suite.

column1: Having issues configuring the extension? Contact our support desk:
column2: Having issues configuring the extension? Contact our support desk:

column1: Here you can define default values for additional shipping services. Please note that selected options are only applied if they are valid for the given order. Incompatible services, e.g. domestic-only services for a cross-border order, will be omitted when booking a shipping label.
column2: Here you can define default values for additional shipping services. Please note that selected options are only applied if they are valid for the given order. Incompatible services, e.g. domestic-only services for a cross-border order, will be omitted when booking a shipping label.

column1: If enabled, DHL will be notified that an electronic export declaration was completed by the merchant and that an Export Accompanying Document (EAD) is attached to the parcel. See also Customs Information.
column2: If enabled, DHL will be notified that an electronic export declaration was completed by the merchant and that an Export Accompanying Document (EAD) is attached to the parcel. See also Customs Information.

column1: If enabled, a return shipment label will be requested from the webservice. A return address other than the Shipping Origin can be configured below.
column2: If enabled, a return shipment label will be requested from the webservice. A return address other than the Shipping Origin can be configured below.

column1: If enabled, shipment orders will only return a label if the DHL delivery address verification succeeds.
column2: If enabled, shipment orders will only return a label if the DHL delivery address verification succeeds.

column1: If enabled, shipments will be insured with higher than standard amount.
column2: If enabled, shipments will be insured with higher than standard amount.

column1: If enabled, shipments will be marked as bulk freight.
column2: If enabled, shipments will be marked as bulk freight.

column1: If enabled, the receiver phone number will be printed on the shipping label.
column2: If enabled, the receiver phone number will be printed on the shipping label.

column1: If enabled, the visual age check service will be booked during shipment orders.
column2: If enabled, the visual age check service will be booked during shipment orders.

column1: If enabled, your undeliverable packages will be held at the nearest parcel collection point for collection by the recipient rather than being returned immediately to you.
column2: If enabled, your undeliverable packages will be held at the nearest parcel collection point for collection by the recipient rather than being returned immediately to you.

column1: If you do not have a DHL Paket account, please contact DHL Paket to establish or expand your relationship
column2: If you do not have a DHL Paket account, please contact DHL Paket to establish or expand your relationship

column1: In addition to your account number you need your 2-digit Procedure and Participation number
column2: In addition to your account number you need your 2- digit Procedure and Participation number

column1: Label for order %1, package %2 could not be created.
column2: Label for order %1, package %2 could not be created.

column1: Multi package shipments are not supported.
column2: Multi package shipments are not supported.

column1: No locations found for the given address. Please try another address.
column2: No locations found for the given address. Please try another address.

column1: Non-delivery notice will be sent to this email address. If left empty, the customer's email address is used. In this case, you must make sure to obtain data privacy consent from your customers.
column2: Non-delivery notice will be sent to this email address. If left empty, the customer's email address is used. In this case, you must make sure to obtain data privacy consent from your customers.

column1: On routes that require the Premium service, it will be booked implicitly regardless of this setting.
column2: On routes that require the Premium service, it will be booked implicitly regardless of this setting.

column1: Partial shipments with Cash on Delivery or Insurance service are not supported. Please ship the entire order in one package or deselect the service.
column2: Partial shipments with Cash on Delivery or Insurance service are not supported. Please ship the entire order in one package or deselect the service.

column2: Please choose your preferred delivery options.

column1: Preferred Neighbor: Delivery to a neighbor of your choice
column2: Preferred Neighbor: Delivery to a neighbor of your choice

column1: Record communication with the DHL web services.
column2: Record communication with the DHL web services.

column1: Reference an entry from your DHL Business Customer Portal address book. If left blank, the origin address configured in Shipping Settings will be used. Using an entry from the DHL sender address book allows to print your logo on the label. This setting is ignored in sandbox mode.
column2: Reference an entry from your DHL Business Customer Portal address book. If left blank, the origin address configured in Shipping Settings will be used. Using an entry from the DHL sender address book allows to print your logo on the label. This setting is ignored in sandbox mode.

column1: Select "Merchandise Shipment" only if you ship all or most of your orders as Merchandise Shipments. Otherwise, choose "DHL Paket".
column2: Select "Merchandise Shipment" only if you ship all or most of your orders as Merchandise Shipments. Otherwise, choose "DHL Paket".

column1: Select the offline shipping method that gets used to provide rates in checkout.
column2: Select the offline shipping method that gets used to provide rates in checkout.

column1: Selected products will be pre-selected for automatic shipping label creation. You can still select another product when creating shipping labels manually.
column2: Selected products will be pre-selected for automatic shipping label creation. You can still select another product when creating shipping labels manually.

column1: Some values for neighbor delivery are missing.
column2: Some values for neighbor delivery are missing.

column1: The EKP number (standardized customer and product number) is the key to using the products of Deutsche Post DHL. It is 10 digits and is allocated by DHL Sales.
column2: The EKP number (standardized customer and product number) is the key to using the products of Deutsche Post DHL. It is 10 digits and is allocated by DHL Sales.

column1: The customer integration gateway of DHL provides generic test endpoints for the calling APIs. Select this option to use the test environment.
column2: The customer integration gateway of DHL provides generic test endpoints for the calling APIs. Select this option to use the test environment.

column1: The given additional charge will be applied to the shipping costs at checkout. Set to "0" to offer service for free.
column2: The given additional charge will be applied to the shipping costs at checkout. Set to "0" to offer service for free.

column1: The log level Info should only be set while resolving problems. It may result in very large log files.
column2: The log level Info should only be set while resolving problems. It may result in very large log files.

column1: The participation number enables invoices to be subdivided according to location, seasonal business or different conditions. The participation number consists of 2 alphanumeric characters. It is allocated by DHL Sales.
column2: The participation number enables invoices to be subdivided according to location, seasonal business or different conditions. The participation number consists of 2 alphanumeric characters. It is allocated by DHL Sales.

column1: The post number is your personal identification code that you receive with your registration at DHL.
column2: The post number is your personal identification code that you receive with your registration at DHL.

column1: The rates will get used even if the selected shipping method is disabled. The available method names will also be those of the selected shipping method.
column2: The rates will get used even if the selected shipping method is disabled. The available method names will also be those of the selected shipping method.

column1: There was a problem finding locations. Please check if the address is valid.
column2: There was a problem finding locations. Please check if the address is valid.

column1: These settings will be used for automatic shipping label creation. If a label cannot be created with your configured defaults, the order must be processed manually. Use the DHL Label Status Column in the Order list to identify those orders.
column2: These settings will be used for automatic shipping label creation. If a label cannot be created with your configured defaults, the order must be processed manually. Use the DHL Label Status Column in the Order list to identify those orders.

column1: This field determines where DHL Paket will be displayed on the Checkout page. To display after Flat Rate or Free Shipping, enter a number just higher than the sort order value configured for those shipping methods.
column2: This field determines where DHL Paket will be displayed on the Checkout page. To display after Flat Rate or Free Shipping, enter a number just higher than the sort order value configured for those shipping methods.
